title: Masked Shaco's Deceive (Q) particle is replaced by the classic skin's smoke particle (See images)
body:
Masked Shaco Q before 6.22: http://i43.tinypic.com/1r3m8w.jpg
Masked Shaco Q after 6.22: http://i39.tinypic.com/2m6o8yr.jpg 

same as classic and other skins

Main reason I bought Masked Shaco is now gone

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! This was likely due to the assassin update, unfortunately. D: The good news is, the fix for this should be in the latest patch (6.23). Please let me know if you're still experiencing this issue!
